properties.areaDesc: Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 3:18PM AKST until January 30 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8
inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph.

* WHERE...Pelican and Elfin Cove.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM AKST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds could
cause tree damage and power outages. Improperly moored boats and
aircraft may break loose from their tie-downs.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow is likely during the morning
hours. Snowfall rates of 2 inches per hour are possible for a
short time in the morning. Winds will increase rapidly during
the afternoon out of the west and southwest with gusts as high
as 60 mph leading to blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM AKST THURSDAY NEAR PELICAN AND ELFIN COVE
